method.name: get_user_keydir
method.tp:docstring: Get the user crypto keys directory, or empty string if not mounted.

method.name: get_remote_user_hash
method.tp:docstring: Get the remote user hash of the specified userid.

method.name: auth_rm_platform_user
method.tp:docstring: Used to recover access to platform when user has forgotten local password.

method.name: get_idle_time
method.tp:docstring: Get Idle Time of the Host.

method.name: get_last_input_time
method.tp:docstring: Returns the number of seconds since the most recent input activity or from start of input server.

method.name: get_lid_state
method.tp:docstring: Returns lid state. A value of one indicates lid is open otherwise closed.

method.name: divert_mouse_focus
method.tp:docstring: Diverts the mouse focus to the provided VM, for mouse events occurring within the given source frame. Events outside of this frame continue go to the calling VM. Mouse events are scaled to fit within the destination frame. Any area outside of the destination frame will not be accessible with the mouse. Coordinates: 0 is always left/top most, 0x1FFF right/bottom most, regardless of screen resolution.

method.name: stop_mouse_divert
method.tp:docstring: This method stops a mouse focus divert, which was created using divert_mouse_focus.

method.name: set_divert_keyboard_filter
method.tp:docstring: This sets the keyboard filter, used with divert_keyboard_focus. Key_filter is an array of null terminated key value sets. Each key value set consists of a list of key values for any modifer keys, followed by a final activation key.

method.name: divert_keyboard_focus
method.tp:docstring: Diverts the keyboard focus to the provided VM, filtering provided key strokes, which continue to go to the original VM. Key_filter is a null terminated array of key value sets, each of which is itself null terminated.

method.name: stop_keyboard_divert
method.tp:docstring: This method stops a keyboard focus divert, which was created using divert_keyboard_focus.

method.name: touch
method.tp:docstring: Introduce an input event, into the given VM, to defer it from sleeping.

method.name: focus_mode
method.tp:docstring: This bitfield allows the keyboard/mouse focus behaviour to be tweeked. Bit 1 =KEYFOLLOWMOUSE, Bit 2 = CLICKHOLDFOCUS, Bit 3 = CLONEEVENTS. The default mode is 0.

property.name: numlock-restore-on-switch
property.tp:docstring: Restore NumLock status on switch to VM.

signal.name: keyboard_focus_change
signal.tp:docstring: This allows the monitoring of the keyboard focus, by signaling the UUID of the VM gaining focus.

signal.name: focus_auth_field
signal.tp:docstring: Sent to notify UI to focus the text field in secure mode.

signal.name: sync_auth_username
signal.tp:docstring: Sent to set the username in the UI in secure mode.

signal.name: auth_status
signal.tp:docstring: Sent to change the status in the UI in secure mode.

signal.name: secure_mode
signal.tp:docstring: Sent to the UI to enter secure mode.

signal.name: auth_remote_start_login
signal.tp:docstring: Sent to the BED to kick off Synchronizer auth.

signal.name: auth_remote_start_recovery
signal.tp:docstring: Sent to the BED to get recovery key.

signal.name: lid_state_changed
signal.tp:docstring: Signals when a laptop lid is opened or closed.
